About MindLoop AI

MindLoop AI is a collaborative project born out of a shared passion for artificial intelligence, automation, and building real-world applications that solve communication problems.

Dragomir Bozoki ‚Äì Machine Learning / Deep Learning Engineer

üß† How It Started

The idea for MindLoop AI started as an academic project focused on visual speech recognition without audio. After months of experimentation, prototyping, and testing, it evolved into a broader initiative to create practical AI assistants for real-world use ‚Äî from chatbots for tourism and e-commerce, to tools like CopyBot that automate repetitive tasks.
